text: I haven’t done long cooks with them before so I can’t make any solid guarantee it will hold up, but I once poached something in a Reynolds oven bag in a pinch and it worked fine. Maybe think about crockpot liner. Basically I just think of something big that is designed to be food safe at high temp. Of course with either of those there is no way to seal the top so you have to be careful with how you use and secure it
What she didn’t tell you is that you were already 5 years old when it happened
